*CDB vs CDB/TL bench (time to run on 4way core2 quad, 10 files, lower - better)*

|| THR ||  CDB     || CDB/TL    || no narrow ||
|| 1   || 3.88121  || 3.98515   || 3.62957   ||

so, we can see a bit regression, caused by Narrow (it empty in CDB case, 'no narrow' is a  CDB/TL without filtering)
